text: Houssem Louati (; born 12 May 1992) is a Tunisian professional footballer who last played as an attacking midfielder for Saudi Arabian club Al-Riyadh. == Club career == On 16 September 2020, Louati moved to Saudi Second Division side Al-Riyadh on a one-year contract; he reunited with former Ansar teammate El Hadji Malick Tall. ==References== ==External links== * * * * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:People from Sfax Category:Tunisian footballers Category:Tunisian expatriate footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:CS Sfaxien players Category:Al Ansar FC players Category:Al-Riyadh SC players Category:Tunisian Ligue Professionnelle 1 players Category:Lebanese Premier League players Category:Saudi Second Division players Category:Expatriate footballers in Lebanon Category:Expatriate footballers in Saudi Arabia Category:Tunisian expatriate sportspeople in Lebanon Category:Tunisian expatriate sportspeople in Saudi Arabia
title: Houssem Louati
